references.title: Bibliography
references.biblio: Anton, H. Elementary Linear Algebra. 11th ed. Wiley, New Jersey, 2013.
Dummit, D.S., Foote, R.M. Abstract Algebra. 2nd ed. Wiley, New Jersey, 1999.
Hoffman, K., Kunze, R. Linear Algebra. 2nd ed. Prentice Hall, New Jersey, 1971.
Logan, J.D. A First Course in Differential Equations, Undergraduate Texts in Mathematics. 2nd ed. Springer, New York, 2011.
Nicholson, K. Linear Algebra. 5th ed. McGraw-Hill Ryerson, Toronto, 2006.
Roman, S. Advanced Linear Algebra, Graduate Texts in Mathematics, vol.135. 3rd ed. Springer, New York, 2008.
Sylvestre, J. A problem-centered approach to canonical matrix forms. PRIMUS: Problems, Resources, and Issues in Mathematics Undergraduate Studies, 24:3, p. 247–256.
